message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.

{Name},

Are you ready to leverage new digital tactics for legal marketing but are unsure about the ethical implications? Join us for our upcoming, 60-minute presentation, The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing,* that will help demystify some of the ethical implications surrounding digital/online advertising for lawyers and law firms.

During the webinar, we’ll go over some of the ethical issues concerning law firm websites, blogs, local & business directories, online reviews, lead generation/PPC advertising, social media advertising and more!
message3: Please note: All Justia Connect members are invited to join us for this free presentation but only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit for their attendance. To upgrade to Pro for only $19.99/month, visit connect.justia.com/pro.
* This presentation is approved for one hour of Legal Ethics MCLE credit in California.

message: Name,

We wanted to remind you that you are registered for our upcoming Justia Webinar: The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing.* The presentation will begin on Friday, May 12 promptly at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT.
On presentation day, you can come back to this email and use this link to join us. If you have trouble accessing this presentation, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

Reminder: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of Legal Ethics MCLE credit in California.

Hi Name,

This is your last chance to register for The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing* with Justia CEO Tim Stanley. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to get insights into some of the various ethical implications surround digital advertising for lawyers and law firms.
The webinar will begin promptly at 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT. Claim your spot before they’re gone!

message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 1:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, May 14, 2023 to receive credit.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.
